title: The Cryptovator
author: The Cryptovator
content: The first Bitcoin block was mined on January 9, 2009, at 08:54:25. So today, 15 years ago, we got Bitcoin that was first mined. Out of curiosity, I had been checking Block 1 and surprisingly saw that it was mined this day. So quite excited and expressing the celebrations. I know the discovery process was long, but the final stage was today. Today, the world got a new currency that has changed the world's financial system. I don't know how to thank the mastermind behind this Bitcoin concept, Satoshi Nakamoto, but salute. üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: The Cryptovator on January 09, 2024, 08:12:42 PMThe first Bitcoin block was mined on January 9, 2009, at 08:54:25. So today, 15 years ago, we got Bitcoin that was first mined. Out of curiosity, I had been checking Block 1 and surprisingly saw that it was mined this day. So quite excited and expressing the celebrations. I know the discovery process was long, but the final stage was today. Today, the world got a new currency that has changed the world's financial system. I don't know how to thank the mastermind behind this Bitcoin concept, Satoshi Nakamoto, but salute. üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èHappy birthday to the best innovation humanity has ever known. Bitcoin has changed my life and still changing lives, I'm glad to be part of this wonderful innovation. I want to congratulate all of us who embraced this tech amidst the fuds and discouragements. We are just getting started... Bitcoin has come to stay! Once again, happy birthday Bitcoin!

But famous says Everything has it time when it comes to your life. Today i can say proudly i Own amount in Btc when it is going to make it new All time High very soon inshaAllah. And also I must commend you sir @ The cryptovator for the precise timing towards the creation of this thread and I know this has also improved so many people knowledge who didn't actually knew this vital history of how the first block was mine in this Bitcoin journey.Happy birthday Bitcoin and wish many more years of success and prosperity tooüíØ

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: The Cryptovator on January 09, 2024, 08:12:42 PMSo quite excited and expressing the celebrations. All these sorts of celebrations really remind us of how far bitcoins have come and the rich history it has. Remembrance of these sort of celebrations is encouraging to newbies who are new to bitcoins. Thank you for reminding us of and informing those who are unaware of this date to take note of. I do not think this date will be remembered by people who are investors in bitcoins but not members of this forum. As a benefit of being in this forum we are made aware of these sorts of dates.

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: Quote from: The Cryptovator on January 09, 2024, 08:12:42 PMThe first Bitcoin block was mined on January 9, 2009, at 08:54:25. So today, 15 years ago, we got Bitcoin that was first mined. Out of curiosity, I had been checking Block 1 and surprisingly saw that it was mined this day. So quite excited and expressing the celebrations. I know the discovery process was long, but the final stage was today. Today, the world got a new currency that has changed the world's financial system. I don't know how to thank the mastermind behind this Bitcoin concept, Satoshi Nakamoto, but salute. üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èEverything about bitcoin is worth celebrating. Honestly, I should join you in this celebration of a technology that's like a blessing to the world. I'm still looking back in history till today, if I could come across one, single technology that was invented selflessly to liberate the world from the autocratic system of leadership we have in the world, where just a few people within the systems that try to control all the affairs of the world including the financial system. It doesn't make sense to think over how our leaders remain selfish in their judgements thereby caring less of what it makes of their followers.Thank you bigly to the great inventor of all time, Satoshi Nakomoto who brought about the existence of the Bitcoin and by extension the cryptocurrencies to become another alternative to the fiat currency that's solely controlled by governments. Happy birthday guys!

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: The Cryptovator this is a nice reminder to us. Thanks for bringing this to our notice, and I also saw a news that says the Genesis Block of Bitcoin was created with a huge amount of Bitcoin last week and I believed all those ones were to celebrate the anniversary. Really it is an event that needs to be celebrated. If it is possible there be like some kind of quiz or debate on how we know about the dates of Bitcoin history and it events. Really Bitcoin is a liberty to man kind. What the National Governments can't do for the citizens for years past but Bitcoin did it within the 15th years frame. And it becomes a savior to mankind and with that I also join you The Cryptovator to celebrate the creator of Bitcoin and also Salute üôã with the maximum salute.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Congratulations to Satoshi Nakamoto and all the teams or persons that made it possible for this project to work. And also congrats to we all that keeps believing in this project. It wouldn't have gotten to this height without your trust and believe. And I want to personally thank Mr Cryptovator for the reminder to celebrate the efforts of the great Satoshi Nakamoto. Indeed Bitcoin being the first cryptocurrency is worth celebrating, those who have seen the green lights from it can relate. I'm proud to be a Bitcoin enthusiastü´°.

comments.author: Churchillvv
comments.body: Well, The Cryptovator you have done well for remembering one of the biggest days of Bitcoin. Today is the anniversary of first Bitcoin ever mined, I will always appreciate the effort of the creator of Bitcoin Satoshi Nakamoto and his friends for inventing a currency that obviously deviated from the control system of few persons who call themselves governments.
